Title: Relates to modifying the penalties associated with passing a stopped school bus to include a mandatory driver education course
Summary: Relates to modifying the penalties associated with passing a stopped school bus to include a mandatory driver education course for each offense after a second conviction if recommended by the court.
LawCode: Amd ยง1174, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to modifying the penalties associated with passing a stopped school bus to include a mandatory driver education course
